intro: Eugenia correifolia, commonly known as the flame tree, is a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree native to the Caribbean and parts of South America. It is characterized by its striking, fiery red to orange flowers that bloom in clusters during the dry season. The plant has glossy, dark green,革质 leaves that provide a lush backdrop to its vibrant blooms. Its fruit is a small, round drupe that turns from green to yellow when ripe. Eugenia correifolia is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and parks due to its dramatic floral display.
